channel.title: Client - Custom Items (Recoloring)
channel.description: Alright. I have downloaded a "Item Recolor Generator" and an Item maker. When I choose a color from the generator, it gives me the color ID. But, when I make the item on the Item Maker, with the color ID, I add it into my Class8.java file, save, and compile. When I go into my server with the client, and spawn that certain item, It has my custom name, but the color is red. I tried making a "Pink H'ween" and no matter what color I do, it turn out red... How come the color ID's don't work?

item.title: Client - Custom Items (Recoloring)
item.dc:creator: @Zukyak Zukyak
item.description:
@Zukyak wrote:

You Dont have to do wat N0v said, there are other ways. I think thats just the program ur using.

Read full topic

item.title: Client - Custom Items (Recoloring)
item.dc:creator: @N0vlafe N0vlafe
item.description:
@N0vlafe wrote:

ur not suppose to use Item Recolor Generator, u suppose to edit color of phat using metaseq, than turn it into the color u want, than make it a dat file with dat maker than making it a gzip file, rename it, add to model folder, and add to class8. than go into your server and type add model (name of the model) than compile

Read full topic

item.title: Client - Custom Items (Recoloring)
item.dc:creator: @Incognito Incognito
item.description:
@Incognito wrote:

Alright. I have downloaded a “Item Recolor Generator” and an Item maker. When I choose a color from the generator, it gives me the color ID. But, when I make the item on the Item Maker, with the color ID, I add it into my Class8.java file, save, and compile. When I go into my server with the client, and spawn that certain item, It has my custom name, but the color is red. I tried making a “Pink H’ween” and no matter what color I do, it turn out red… How come the color ID’s don’t work?
